analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#188) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#287-319)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#391-414)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#486-501)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#508-523)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#586-596) is declared view but contains assembly code

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#617-629) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#628)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#553-554) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#597-598)

Reentrancy in MiniMeMintableToken.mint (/unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#700-714):
	External calls:
	- generateTokens(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#704)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- issuedTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#713)

MiniMeVestedToken.getVestedBalance (/unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#830-864) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- _currentTime < _vestingStartTime (/unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#834-838)
	- _currentTime >= _vestingStartTime.add(vestingPeriodTime.mul(vestingTotalPeriods)) (/unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#840-845)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#586-596)
	- /unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#589-596
MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#158)
TokenController.proxyPayment (/unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#38-40) should be declared external
TokenController.onTransfer (/unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#46-48) should be declared external

MiniMeToken.allowance (/unique_chucks/2/0x9e88613418cf03dca54d6a2cf6ad934a78c7a17a.sol#351-353) should be declared external
